title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Blended Research Capacity Enhancement Program for Clinical Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply a systematic framework to analyze research problems encountered in clinical settings.
Learners can utilize digital tools to develop research proposals in blended learning environments.
Learners can complete research projects incorporating peer feedback and present them according to established evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
